name: Super Gridworld Brothers!
description:
Move around, jump around, click to fire current weapon, switch your weapon around. Don't fall off, or other players will gain a point!

This game is multiplayer and you need at least 2 people in order to start the game. The game will start immediately when a second person connects.

This game does not... track score well for more than 2 players. Everything else should function fine.

Credits:

Character model asset is a Unity default model.

Server list provided by Unity.
